changeSet.author: niro_bb
changeSet.sql: create table deal_contractor ( id uuid primary key not null, deal_id uuid references deal (id) not null, contractor_id varchar(12) not null, name text not null, inn text, main boolean not null default false, create_date timestamp not null default now(), modify_date timestamp, create_user_id text, modify_user_id text, is_active boolean not null default true );
